title: Amaziahâ€™s Pride and Defeat
summary: Amaziah begins with obedience but later turns proud. He wins a battle against Edom, then worships their gods. After challenging Israel to battle and losing, he is humiliated and later assassinated by conspirators.

faq.question: What did Amaziah do after defeating Edom?
faq.answer: He brought back their idols and worshipped them, angering God.

faq.question: How did his reign end?
faq.answer: He was defeated by Israel and eventually assassinated by his own people.
